title: Cinnamon-Walnut Granola
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Brush a large baking pan with oil; set aside. In a large bowl, combine oats, walnuts, seeds, and cinnamon.
In a medium pan over medium heat, stir honey, sugar, and butter until combined. Pour over oat mixture and toss.

In pan, spread mixture in a thin layer. Bake for 20 minutes, then flip granola; bake for 15 minutes more. Turn off oven and let granola sit for 10 minutes. Transfer pan to a wire rack to cool. Break granola into pieces.
